title: Linear and rotation - compare v for Wheels A and B

content.question: Two wheels, Wheel <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>A</mtext></math> and Wheel <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>B</mtext></math>, are each rotating about an axis through their centers with angular velocities that are constant. Wheel <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math> has a radius <math alttext="r sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>r</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math> and rotates one revolution in a time interval <math alttext="delta t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>Δ</mtext><mi>t</mi></math>. Wheel <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>B</mtext></math> has a radius of <math alttext="2 r sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>r</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math> and rotates one revolution in a time interval <math alttext="2 delta t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><mtext>Δ</mtext><mi>t</mi></math>. Which of the following correctly describes the linear speed <math alttext="v sub A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub></math> of a point located on the edge of Wheel <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>A</mtext></math> and the linear speed <math alttext="v sub B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub></math> of a point located halfway between the center and the edge of Wheel <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>B</mtext></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="v sub A is greater than v sub B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub></math>
<math alttext="v sub A is less than v sub B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub></math>

<math alttext="v sub A equals v sub B, which is greater than 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><mn>0</mn></math>

<math alttext="v sub A equals v sub B, which equals 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="v sub A is greater than v sub B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub></math>
